sec.title: Correction to: Journal of Autism and Developmental Disorders (2021) 51:4013–4032 10.1007/s10803-020-04844-2
sec.p: Please note the following corrections to this article:

The article references Sensory Integration® (SI) four times in the text and in Table 2 and Fig. 4. To clarify the practice for which our review found evidence, these should instead read “Ayres Sensory Integration® (ASI®)”. The corrected terminology can be found in all of our web-based materials: https://ncaep.fpg.unc.edu/research-resources

fn.p: Springer Nature remains neutral with regard to jurisdictional claims in published maps and institutional affiliations.
